title: Convert the ClusterIP to NodePort for the same service and find the NodePort port. Hit service using Node's IP. Delete the service and the pod at the end.
description: Convert the ClusterIP to NodePort for the same service and find the NodePort port. Hit service using Node's IP. Delete the service and the pod at the end.

steps: 4. wget -O- NODE_IP:31931 # if you're using Kubernetes with Docker for Windows/Mac, try 127.0.0.1
5. kubectl delete svc nginx # Deletes the service
6. kubectl delete pod nginx # Deletes the pod
